chunks.title: Network Operation Limitations
chunks.body: CRITICAL: NYLA operations work within same blockchain network ONLY. NO cross-network bridging supported. Examples: Solana→Solana (✅), Ethereum→Ethereum (✅), Algorand→Algorand (✅), but Solana→Ethereum (❌), Ethereum→Algorand (❌), any cross-network operations (❌). NYLA supports transfers and swaps within individual networks only. For cross-chain transfers, users need dedicated bridge services outside of NYLA. NYLA focuses on within-network operations for security and simplicity.
chunks.summary_en: All NYLA operations are within-network only. No cross-chain bridging between different blockchains.
chunks.summary_zh: 所有NYLA操作仅限于同一网络内。不同区块链之间无跨链桥接。
